mapper.sql: id, topic_id, topic_type, user_id, status, operate_time
mapper.insert: insert into t_like (id, topic_id, topic_type, user_id, status, operate_time) values (#{id},#{topicId},#{topicType},#{userId},#{status},#{operateTime})
mapper.select: SELECT status FROM `t_like` WHERE (video_id = #{videoId} and user_id = #{userId})
mapper.update: update `t_like` set status = #{status} , operate_time = #{operateTime} where video_id = #{videoId} and user_id =#{userId}
